name: Open with HexEdit
description: Support you to open a file or folder directly with HexEdit. Then, you can start the file edition immediately. If you haven't installed HexEdit, it will let you quickly get the HexEdit installer and guide you to accomplish the installation in a short time.

apps.name: HexEdit
apps.description: Support you to open a file or folder directly with HexEdit. Then, you can start the file edition immediately. If you haven't installed HexEdit, it will let you quickly get the HexEdit installer and guide you to accomplish the installation in a short time.

subname: Quickly open the target file or folder with HexEdit.
